New films and DVDs for March 2016

Written by Brandon King · Published Mar 1, 2016

The hunger games: Mockingjay – part 2

As the war of Panem escalates to the destruction of other districts, Katniss Everdeen, the reluctant leader of the rebellion, must bring together an army against President Snow, while all she holds dear hangs in the balance.

The good dinosaur

In a world where dinosaurs and humans co-exist, an unlikely friendship blossoms between a boy and a dinosaur in the latest offering from Pixar.

The lady in the van

British comedy about Alan Bennett’s friendship with Mary Shepherd (Maggie Smith), a woman living at the end of his driveway.

Bridge of spies

Oscar-nominated thriller set in the Cold War. Tom Hanks stars as James B. Donovan, a lawyer recruited by the CIA to defend a Soviet spy.

Black mass

True crime drama starring Johnny Depp as Whitey Bulger, trapped between the worlds of the Boston mafia and the FBI.

Carol

Romance set in 1950s New York between Therese Belivet (Rooney Mara) and Carol (Cate Blanchett). Adapted from the novel The price of salt by Patricia Highsmith.
